room_title: Escape room "The Missing Doctor" by Puzzle Theory in Hartford
room_description: Dr. X has been missing for weeks. Can you decipher the clues left in his office to figure out where he is? Normally his absence is nothing out of the ordinary. However, he usually stays in contact. His office has not turned over any specific clues to his whereabouts. We are afraid something went awfully wrong with one of his inventions. Can you uncover the truth?
